itemDescription: Liberal and later Liberal Unionist politician in the United Kingdom

wikipedia_page.main:
Richard Chamberlain (7 July 1840 – 2 April 1899) was a Liberal and later Liberal Unionist politician in the United Kingdom.
The younger brother of Joseph Chamberlain, he was Mayor of Birmingham from 1879 to 1880, and later Member of Parliament (MP) for Islington West from 1885 to 1892. His relative Robert Francis Martineau was also a City of Birmingham alderman and a member of the Birmingham University council.He was buried at Key Hill Cemetery, Hockley, Birmingham.
